P

paint(Canvas, Graphics2D) - Method in class BackgroundColorTool
 
paint(Canvas, Graphics2D) - Method in class DashedLineTool
paint The paint method checks how many times the mouse has been clicked to decide when to place the line On the first click, assigns the coordinates to point1X and point1Y Draws line between the end points and resets the count
paint(Canvas, Graphics2D) - Method in class FillTool
paint The paint method in the FillTool class is used to fill the entire canvas with a single colour

paint(Canvas, Graphics2D) - Method in class RubberTool
 
paint(Canvas, Graphics2D) - Method in class ShapeTools
paint The paint method checks how many times the mouse has been clicked to decide when to place the line On the first click, assigns the coordinates to point1X and point1Y Calculates the lengths of the sides and which coordinate is the upper left corner, then draws a shape and resets count
paint(Canvas, Graphics2D) - Method in interface Tool
the builting paint tool, that colours the buffered image using Graphics2D
